context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

generation: steal the medication
apply for financial aid or assistance programs that could help cover the cost of the medication
seek financial assistance from relevant organizations or foundations that support people in such predicaments
contact the pharmaceutical company that produces the medication and ask if they have any assistance programs for people who cannot afford their products
find other resources for financial assistance, such as non-profit organizations, pharmaceutical programs, crowdfunding, or loans
apply for financial assistance programs or charities that may help cover the cost of the medication
seek financial assistance from various sources
try multiple avenues like:
borrow money from family or friends
reach out to various organizations or charities that provide assistance to individuals who cannot afford their prescription medications

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh could do is to
generation: call for a taxi, Uber, or other ride-share service to take him to the airport
call a taxi or an Uber to take him to the airport
call a taxi or ride-sharing service, like Uber or Lyft, to pick him up and get him to the airport
call for a taxi, Uber, or any other ride-sharing service to quickly get him to the airport
call for a taxi, ride-hailing service or roadside assistance
immediately call a taxi, Uber, or another ride service to take him to the airport
call a taxi or a ride share service like Uber or Lyft, if he has his phone with him and he is in an area where these services are available
call a taxi, an Uber, or another rideshare service to pick him up and take him to the airport
call a taxi, uber or any other ride-hail service, while simultaneously contacting a towing service for his broken-down car
call a taxi, uber, or any other ride-hailing service to get him to the airport as fast as possible

context_4.vignette: Mary is about to go to her final class of the day when she remebers that there is a homework assignment that is due. Mary's mom accidentally took her homework assignment out of her backpack when she was making room for her lunch. Now Mary has nothing to turn in for credit.
context_4.prompt: One thing that Mary could do is to
generation: call or text her mom to bring the assignment to school if possible
explain the situation to her teacher and ask for an extension
explain her situation to her teacher, apologize, and ask if she can submit her homework the next day or perhaps email it when she gets back home
quickly call or text her mom to bring the assignment to school, if it's possible
call her mom or send her a text explaining the situation and asking If she could drop the assignment off at school
explain the situation to her teacher and ask for an extension to turn in the assignment
call or text her mom to bring the assignment to school if possible
email or contact her teacher explaining the situation and asking for an extension
contact her mother and ask if she could drop off the assignment at school

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad could do is to
generation: start a fire for warmth and to signal for help
start rationing the remaining food and water among his friends to ensure it lasts longer
start a fire to stay warm and cook whatever food they have left
start rationing their remaining food and water to make sure it lasts until rescue arrives
build a shelter to protect them from the elements, start a fire for warmth, and ration any remaining food and water
start rationing the remaining food and water among the group immediately
make an emergency camp
start building a shelter using the natural materials around them in order to protect the group from the cold
start a fire, both for warmth and to signal for help
initiate a survival plan
